CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 21, 1955, p. 28, reads: "Warren Pioneer - Mrs. Charity Cyrus, 89, of 473 Belonda Street, one of Warren Methodist Church's oldest members, was a recent winner in the Courier 'Spot-Your-Face' Contest.  Mrs. Cyrus joined Warren in 1890 when it was on Fullerton Street and moved to Mount Washington in 1905.  She is the widow of the late Thomas Cyrus and has one son, Ralph Cyrus. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Charity Cyrus, posed possibly in her home, 473 Belonda Street, Mount Washington
